meanings.sent1: The ungracious man pushed past everyone in line without saying excuse me.
meanings.sent2: She received an ungracious response when she asked for help.
meanings.sent3: The ungracious guest refused to thank the host for the delicious meal.
meanings.sent4: His ungracious behavior cast a shadow over the otherwise cheerful gathering.
meanings.sent5: The ungracious customer made the waiter feel unwelcome with his rude remarks.

meanings.sent1: Her ungracious attitude towards the gift hurt his feelings.
meanings.sent2: The ungracious child never said thank you for the presents.
meanings.sent3: It was ungracious of him to ignore the kind gesture extended to him.
meanings.sent4: The ungracious response left a bitter taste in her mouth.
meanings.sent5: The ungracious recipient simply tossed the gift aside without a word of thanks.

meanings.sent1: The ungracious design of the building made it stand out for all the wrong reasons.
meanings.sent2: Her ungracious outfit clashed with the elegant theme of the party.
meanings.sent3: The ungracious painting seemed out of place among the beautiful artworks.
meanings.sent4: The ungracious garden lacked the beauty of its well-maintained neighbors.
meanings.sent5: The ungracious music failed to capture the audience's attention like the other performances.
